about_the_game: The official soundtrack for Dark Nights with Poe and Munro containing 18 tracks hand selected and composed by Gareth Foy alongside the title theme (Isi Clarke) and Poe and Munro's song (Tim Cowles) - the perfect accompaniment to the videogame!
detailed_description: The official soundtrack for Dark Nights with Poe and Munro containing 18 tracks hand selected and composed by Gareth Foy alongside the title theme (Isi Clarke) and Poe and Munro's song (Tim Cowles) - the perfect accompaniment to the videogame!
